name: Paper Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date?
description: Welcome to Elsinore Academy, a proving ground for young royalty; where people from all over the globe come for higher learning, and the cheerleaders are literal witches. Are you ready to enroll? Maybe get with Othello? Eh? EH?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Storage: 468 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Storage: 468 MB available space
